General.Name: Asiainfo Security Technologies Corp. A
General.Description: Asiainfo Security Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides network security software in China and internationally. The company offers digital trust and identity security product systems; endpoint security product systems; cloud network edge security product systems, and network security services. It serves telecom operators, finance, government, manufacturing, energy, medical care, and transportation sectors. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Nanjing, China.
